  ✖ Use shorthand syntax for Fragment elements instead of standard syntax.

    <Fragment></Fragment>
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Shorthand fragment syntax saves keystrokes and is only unapplicable when keys are required.

  ℹ Recommended fix

  - <Fragment></Fragment>
